entry.name: Cdk5 is required for memory function and hippocampal plasticity via the cAMP signaling pathway
entry.description: Guan JS, Su SC, Gao J, Joseph N, Xie Z, Zhou Y, Durak O, Zhang L, Zhu J, Clauser KR, Carr SA, Tsai LH. PLoS ONE, 2011, 6(9): e25735. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0025735. PMCID:PMC3184170.
